company.name: The Virtual Paralegal
company.tagline: Stepping into the Future of the Law Practice
company.description: The Virtual Paralegal provides attorneys with educated, detailed and reliable support without the costs that come with a full time employee. We offer virtual paralegal services including drafting, scheduling, case management, and more to help law practices operate efficiently in today's technology-driven world.

hero.headline: Stepping into the Future of the Law Practice
hero.subheadline: Virtual offices are no longer a thing of the future. With today's technology, many professionals are shedding the traditional idea of an 'office,' and defining business on their own terms.

about.headline: About The Virtual Paralegal - Giovanni Neal, FRP
about.content: Ms. Neal attended Texas State University from 1998 to 2006, where she received both her bachelor's and master's degree. In 2003, Ms. Neal graduated with a Bachelor of Science degree in Criminal Justice, with an emphasis in Pre-Law. She went on to graduate with a Master of Arts in Legal Studies. Ms. Neal has continued to expand her legal knowledge as a legal secretary and paralegal supporting litigation attorneys in the fields of business/commercial litigation, condominium/homeowner association disputes, foreclosure, employment, personal injury, landlord-tenant, and trial practice. Ms. Neal is a Florida Registered paralegal with substantial experience in the field of litigation with a focus on practice and procedure.

values.title: Save on Employee Costs
values.description: Meet your needs while you contemplate if another full-time employee is right for your office. You can still bill for our time!

values.title: Ethical & Confidential
values.description: We understand that client confidentiality is a must and will advise of any potential conflict that may arise.

values.title: Experienced & Reliable
values.description: Educated, detailed and reliable support without the costs that come with a full time employee.
